text: Helicia shweliensis is a species of plant in the family Proteaceae. It is endemic to China, where it is confined to Yunnan. It is threatened by habitat loss. The causes of habitat loss are attributed to a variety of factors, but the most prevalent factors include the destruction of forests in favor of constructing plantations for the production of cash crops. ==References== shweliensis Category:Endemic flora of Yunnan Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Helicia shweliensis
